"A.D.2028/4/2/18:00": "That's - big bro's room! It can't be!!"
"COOL, COOOL, COOOOL! This is GREAT, Everything has been blown smoothly, right?! I was able to capture a SPECTACULAR SCENE!"
"Mother's traitor, COME HERE! Aren't I right, HITSUGI GIRL?"
"You're the one... responsible for this?!"
"Hahaha, I'll tell you something boring, right?! In Japan, we have a saying \"it's obvious\", don't we?"
"You... killed my brother!"
"Huh? Automatic Translation has failed? Oh well, I bet you're still asking the same thing again, am I right?"
"Fufu, I see... Well then, I'm sure that this scene will answer you - I bet we'll capture a SENSATIONAL video, right?"
"That's right, Hitsugi GIRL! The one who blew away Enga BOY was me! BETHOR ZELAZNY!"
"YOUR BROTHER has been wiped clean! Right in front of my eyes, he went \"KABOOM!\" and EXPLOSION, without a trace! Wouldn't you say, am I right?"
"Ame no HABAKIRI!"
"Hahaha! Great genuine expression! A quavering face filled with regret and anger! You don't get rare scenes like this often, yo!"
"You sure about this Hitsugi GIRL? You've gotten soooo hot headed and forgot all about your feet. I would think that spot over there is too hot for you?"
"Kyaaa!"
"A... BOMB?!"
"NO NO NO NO! CUT! Hitsugi GIRL! If you're provoked by a taunt this easily, people'll think that this is some sort of monotone book!"
"You're all supposed to be my long-awaited ACTORS who'll bring life to this FILM! I beg you! Gimme more EXCITING MOVES, yo!"
"I remember now... Bethor Zelazny. The Hollywood movie director who became famous over time through his special effects skills."
"That's right, the film director who EXCITED the whole nation! BETHOR ZELAZNY! AND Mother Cluster's Apostle of Wood!"
"You see, Mother told me that I would FILM something EXCITING if I came to Japan. Before I knew it, I actually CAME HERE, Hahaha!"
"Therefore, Hitsugi GIRL! Gimme more MOVES that make me feel the BURN! Put more CHARM into your ACTING, PLEASE!"

"Stop messing around! What do you mean by
\"FILM\" or \"EXCITING\"?!
Because of that... my brother is..."
"OK OK OKAY! GOOD SOUL! But Hitsugi GIRL, your sight sure is narrow."
"OKAY... WELCOME!! With this, I can now film something COOLER and TOUGH!"
"ACTORS! STANDBY! SCENE... ACTION!"
